PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Invoice Pdf. You could for example include bank account number and terms of payment.
Fooman Pdf editor: Pridajte vaše poznámky, budú zobrazené na spodku faktúry. Môžete uviesť bankové spojenie alebo platobné podmienky.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Creditmemo Pdf
Fooman Pdf editor: Pridajte vaše poznámky. Zobrazia sa na spodku dobropisu.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Shipment Pdf
Fooman Pdf editor: Pridajte vaše poznámky. Zobrazia sa na spodku dodacieho listu.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Choose Helvetica, Times or Courier for smaller filesizes. Choose the Dejavu-Variants to support more characters (UTF-8).
Fooman Pdf editor: Ak si zvolíte písmo Helvetica, Times alebo Courier, bude výsledný súbor malý. Zvoľte Dejavu-Varianty, pre špeciálné (UTF-8) znaky.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Which addresses should appear on the Credit Memo? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
Fooman Pdf editor: Ktoré adresy zobraziť na dobropise? Nezabudnite, že stiahnuteľné produkty (downloadable product) nemajú dodací list.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Which addresses should appear on the invoice? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
Fooman Pdf editor: Ktoré adresy zobraziť na fakture? Nezabudnite, že stiahnuteľné produkty (downloadable product) nemajú dodaciu adresu.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Which addresses should appear on the packing slip? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
Fooman Pdf editor: Ktoré adresy zobraziť na dodacom liste? Nezabudnite, že stiahnuteľné produkty (downloadable product) nemajú dodaciu adresu.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Copy the contents of your certificate/signature file including your private key here. Include everything from -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- to -----END CERTIFICATE-----
Fooman Pdf editor: Nakopírujte obsah vášho certifikátu/podpisu, vrátane vášho prístupového kľúča. Zkopírujte všetko od -----BEGIN RSA PRIVATE KEY----- do -----END CERTIFICATE-----

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Add your custom comments here to appear at the bottom of the Order Pdf.
Fooman Pdf editor: Pridajte vaše komentáre, ktoré sa zobrazia na konci výtlačku objednávky.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Which addresses should appear on the order? Please note that downloadable product orders don't have a shipping address.
Fooman Pdf editor: Které adresy majú býť zobrazené v objednávke? Nezabudnite, že stiahnuteľné produkty (downloadable products) nemajú dodaciu adresu.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Displays the date of the invoice again. Needed in some jurisdictions.
Fooman Pdf editor: Opakovane zobraziť dátum fakturácie. Nutné v niektorých právnych systémoch.

PdfCustomiser by Fooman: Use this option if you would like to print packing slips without having to create shipments. You will however loose the ability to print the packing slips with the shipment number (the order number is used instead).
Fooman Pdf editor: Použite túto možnosť ak chcete vylačiť etikety na balík bez vytvárania zásielky. Týmto stratíte možnosť vytlačiť etiketu na balík s číslom zásielky (bude použité číslo objednávky).

Logo top-left Corner from the top

is only effective if Tax > Orders, Invoices, Creditmemos Display Settings > Prices is set to not display taxes
